content:
Late check-out policies can vary from hotel to hotel, but I've got the scoop for you:

**Late Check-out Policies:**

* **The Edgewater Hotel**: Late check-out is available until 2:00 PM, subject to availability. A half-day rate may apply.
* **Four Seasons Hotel Seattle**: Late check-out is available until 2:00 PM, subject to availability. A half-day rate may apply.
* **The Alexis Hotel**: Late check-out is available until 1:00 PM, subject to availability. A half-day rate may apply.
* **Hyatt at Olive 8**: Late check-out is available until 2:00 PM, subject to availability. A half-day rate may apply.
* **Pan Pacific Hotel Seattle**: Late check-out is available until 2:00 PM, subject to availability. A half-day rate may apply.
* **The Sheraton Seattle Hotel**: Late check-out is available until 2:00 PM, subject to availability. A half-day rate may apply.
* **Hotel Andra**: Late check-out is available until 1:00 PM, subject to availability. A half-day rate may apply.

**Additional Fees:**

* If you need more time, some hotels may charge an additional fee for late check-out, which can range from $50 to $100 per hour.
* Some hotels may offer a complimentary late check-out for loyalty program members or guests who book certain room types.

**Tips:**

* Always check with the hotel directly to confirm their late check-out policy and any associated fees.
* If you're a loyalty program member, be sure to ask about any exclusive benefits, such as late check-out privileges.
* If you need more time to get ready, consider booking a later check-out time when you make your reservation or asking about late check-out options when you check-in.

Now, go ahead and sleep in – you've got a bit more time to get ready!
